overview: Six smoldering bareback scenes featuring hot, hard riding cowboys working their horse-dicks in the great outdoors! Featuring Icons of Gay Erotica from the 70's and 80's including Bob Bishop, Lee Ryder, Barry, Ed Wiley, Rod Phillips, Joe Markum and Bert Edwards!  Settle into your saddle, sit back and watch these wild wranglers suck, fuck and ride their mounts into a thick manly lather.  No erotic collection is complete without this prime selection of digitally remastered film footage! These classic scenes have never looked better and you won't want to miss a moment of these wild, wild rides!
title: Cowboys Riding Raw
